{
    "title": "Breaking Bad",
    "description": "A high school chemistry teacher diagnosed with inoperable lung cancer turns to manufacturing and selling methamphetamine in order to secure his family's future.",
    "main_cast": "Bryan Cranston, Aaron Paul",
    "director": "Vince Gillian",
    "year": "2019",
    "type": "series",

}

{
    "title": "Anne With an E",
    "description": "The story of Anne Shirley, an imaginative, strong-willed orphan who transforms the lives of those she encounters after being sent to live with elderly siblings on Prince Edward Island in 1890.",
    "main_cast": "AmyBeth McNulty, Dalila Bela, Geraldine James",
    "director": "John Smith",
    "year": "2017-2019",
    "type": "series",

}

{
    "title": "Feel Good",
    "description": "A comedian living in London navigates sobriety and a new relationship with her girlfriend.",
    "main_cast": "Johan Ray",
    "director": "Mae Martin",
    "year": "2020",
    "type": "series",
    "genre": "drama",

}

{
    "title": "Feel Good",

}

{
    "title": "Giri/Haji",

    "type": "series",

}

{
    "title": "Derek",
    "description": "Ricky Gervais, creator of the original British version of The Office, produces and stars in this heartwarming comedy-drama as Derek Noakes, a loyal English nursing home caretaker who sees only the good in everyone",

    "director": "John Smith",

    "type": "series",
    "genre": "comedy",

}

{
    "title": "Mystery science theater 3000: the return",

}

{
    "title": "Master of None",

{
    "title": "The Gentlemen",
